Description: UPDATE: Two soldiers severely injured from a direct impact of an explosive attack drone fired by Hezbollah from Lebanon towards northern Israel earlier this morning . Also, more than 55 rockets were fired in the last barrage of rockets towards northern Israel.

Title: IDF: Following the sirens that sounded at 14:10 in the area of th...
Description: IDF: Following the sirens that sounded at 14:10 in the area of the Golan Heights, one suspicious aerial target was intercepted after crossing from Lebanon into Israeli territory. No injuries were reported. Additionally, approximately five projectiles were identified crossing from Lebanon into Israeli territory and falling in open areas in the area of Shamir. A siren was sounded in open areas according to protocol. No injuries were reported. Following the sirens that sounded at 14:29 in the area of the Upper Galilee, approximately 20 projectiles were identified crossing from Lebanon into Israeli territory. The majority were intercepted, and some fell in the area of Shamir, mostly in open areas. No injuries were reported.

Title: 🎬 🚨BREAKING: Following multiple rockets fired by Hezbollah from...
Description: 🚨BREAKING: Following multiple rockets fired by Hezbollah from Lebanon toward northern Israel, several impacts in open fields were reported. A fire has erupted near Kibbutz Shamir in northern Israel. #israelunderattack

Title: 🖼 On Tuesday, Hamas terrorists fired rockets from the Humanitari...
Description: On Tuesday, Hamas terrorists fired rockets from the Humanitarian Route in Khan Yunis, Gaza, towards central Israel. Hamas not only endangers Israeli civilians but continues to strategically and purposefully position its military assets within humanitarian infrastructure and civilian-populated areas.

Title: IDF: A short while ago, a projectile that was identified crossing...
Description: IDF: A short while ago, a projectile that was identified crossing from the Gaza Strip fell in the maritime space in central Israel. In accordance with protocol, no sirens were sounded.Simultaneously, an additional projectile that did not cross into Israeli territory was identified.

Title: 🚨 BREAKING: At least 2 rockets fired from Gaza towards central I...
Description: 🚨 BREAKING: At least 2 rockets fired from Gaza towards central Israel. Large explosions heard in Tel Aviv. Reports indicate both rockets exploded in the sea. No physical injuries or damage reported.
